statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT id, sensor_name, value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, sensor_name, AVG(value) as avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id, sensor_name HAVING AVG(value) > 50
SELECT id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'temperature%'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id, timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name, COUNT(device_id) as count_devices FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING count_devices > 1
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp, value FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensors WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, DATE(installation_date) AS install_date FROM devices WHERE location LIKE 'Kitchen%' ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id WHERE sensors.sensor_type = 'Motion' AND sensors.value = 1 ORDER BY devices.device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensors GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_value > 75 ORDER BY avg_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT timestamp, humidity, temperature FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM device WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM environment WHERE temperature_threshold < 20 AND humidity_threshold > 70;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM device WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' OR manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature_threshold FROM environment WHERE humidity_threshold > 60 ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data JOIN device ON sensor_data.device_id = device.id WHERE device.manufacturer = 'Google';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status IS NULL;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT sensor_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'humidity%';
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT devices.device_name, locations.location_name FROM devices INNER JOIN locations ON devices.location = locations.location_name;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 50;

SELECT devices.device_name, COUNT(alerts.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM devices LEFT JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id LEFT JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id GROUP BY devices.device_name ORDER BY num_alerts DESC LIMIT 3;
